00032 #include "GHOST_SystemPathsWin32.h"
00033 
00034 #ifndef _WIN32_IE
00035 #define _WIN32_IE 0x0501
00036 #endif
00037 #include <shlobj.h>
00038 #include "utfconv.h"
00039 
00040 #if defined(__MINGW32__) || defined(__CYGWIN__)
00041 
00042 #if !defined(SHARD_PIDL)
00043 #define SHARD_PIDL      0x00000001L
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #if !defined(SHARD_PATHA)
00047 #define SHARD_PATHA     0x00000002L
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #if !defined(SHARD_PATHW)
00051 #define SHARD_PATHW     0x00000003L
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #if !defined(SHARD_PATH)
00055 #ifdef UNICODE
00056 #define SHARD_PATH  SHARD_PATHW
00057 #else
00058 #define SHARD_PATH  SHARD_PATHA
00059 #endif
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #endif

00064 GHOST_SystemPathsWin32::GHOST_SystemPathsWin32()

00066 }

00068 GHOST_SystemPathsWin32::~GHOST_SystemPathsWin32()

00070 }

00072 const GHOST_TUns8* GHOST_SystemPathsWin32::getSystemDir() const
00073 {
00074     static char knownpath[MAX_PATH*3] = {0}; /* 1 utf-16 might translante into 3 utf-8. 2 utf-16 translates into 4 utf-8*/
00075     wchar_t knownpath_16[MAX_PATH];
00076 
00077     HRESULT hResult = SHGetFolderPathW(NULL, CSIDL_COMMON_APPDATA, NULL, SHGFP_TYPE_CURRENT, knownpath_16);
00078 
00079     if (hResult == S_OK)
00080     {
00081         conv_utf_16_to_8(knownpath_16,knownpath,MAX_PATH*3);
00082         return (GHOST_TUns8*)knownpath;
00083     }
00084 
00085     return NULL;
00086 }
00087 
00088 const GHOST_TUns8* GHOST_SystemPathsWin32::getUserDir() const
00089 {
00090     static char knownpath[MAX_PATH*3] = {0};
00091     wchar_t  knownpath_16[MAX_PATH];
00092 
00093     HRESULT hResult = SHGetFolderPathW(NULL, CSIDL_APPDATA, NULL, SHGFP_TYPE_CURRENT, knownpath_16);
00094 
00095     if (hResult == S_OK)
00096     {
00097         conv_utf_16_to_8(knownpath_16,knownpath,MAX_PATH*3);
00098         return (GHOST_TUns8*)knownpath;
00099     }
00100 
00101     return NULL;
00102 }
00103 
00104 const GHOST_TUns8* GHOST_SystemPathsWin32::getBinaryDir() const
00105 {
00106     static char fullname[MAX_PATH*3] = {0};
00107     wchar_t  fullname_16[MAX_PATH*3];
00108 
00109     if(GetModuleFileNameW(0, fullname_16, MAX_PATH)) {
00110         conv_utf_16_to_8(fullname_16,fullname,MAX_PATH*3);
00111         return (GHOST_TUns8*)fullname;
00112     }
00113 
00114     return NULL;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void GHOST_SystemPathsWin32::addToSystemRecentFiles(const char *filename) const
00118 {
00119     /* SHARD_PATH resolves to SHARD_PATHA for non-UNICODE build */
00120     UTF16_ENCODE(filename);
00121     SHAddToRecentDocs(SHARD_PATHW, filename_16);
00122     UTF16_UN_ENCODE(filename);
00123 }
